tcp: Binary indicator of whether the flow uses TCP
AckDat: Amount of TCP payload data acknowledged by ACK packets
sHops: Estimated hop count from source based on observed TTL
Seq: TCP sequence number behavior metric within the flow
RST: Binary or count indicator of TCP RST flags in the flow
TcpRtt: Estimated TCP round-trip time for the connection
REQ: Count of request packets sent by the source
dMeanPktSz: Average packet size observed in the destination-to-source direction
Offset: TCP header data offset value indicating header length
CON: Binary or count indicator of TCP connection establishment
FIN: Binary or count indicator of TCP FIN flags
sTtl: Observed TTL value of packets from the source
INT: Mean inter-arrival time between packets in the flow
Mean: Mean packet size across the entire flow
Status: Final state of the flow or connection outcome
icmp: Binary indicator of whether the flow uses ICMP
SrcTCPBase: Initial TCP sequence number used by the source
sMeanPktSz: Average packet size observed in the source-to-destination direction
DstLoss: Packet loss estimated at the destination side
Loss: Overall packet loss estimate for the flow
dTtl: Observed TTL value of packets from the destination
SrcBytes: Total bytes sent from source to destination
TotBytes: Total bytes exchanged in both directions of the flow
